description: MCP server to query Data Commons indicators and observations (base or custom).

environmentVariables.name: DC_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Data Commons API key from apikeys.datacommons.org

environmentVariables.name: DC_TYPE
environmentVariables.description: Type of Data Commons to use: base|custom (default: base)

environmentVariables.name: CUSTOM_DC_URL
environmentVariables.description: Custom DC base URL when DC_TYPE=custom

environmentVariables.name: DC_ROOT_TOPIC_DCIDS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated root topic DCIDs for custom DCs

environmentVariables.name: DC_SEARCH_SCOPE
environmentVariables.description: Search scope for custom DCs: base_only|custom_only|base_and_custom
